data.name: Enabling post COVID 19 Operations Through IOT
data.summary:
Topics Covered:
1. Understand how leaders across enterprises are coping with disruption. 
2. The role of IoT & automation in making business future proof. 
3. Understand how IoT can enable operations while keeping in view employee safety and the new norms of the post Covid-19 era.
data.speakers:
Lalit Mishra, Head IoT Sales, Tata Communications

Rajiv Desai, Head IoT Product Management, Tata Communcaitons
